text: i am new to the noodle world but i must say that i was very impressed with the service and the quality of the food i tried the green bean tempura and was completely blown away by its deliciousness the ramen bowls were equally impressive and the duck bowl was a standout i highly recommend this establishment to anyone who is looking for a musttry dining experience i eagerly anticipate my next visit
have ordered take out from here several times and would recommend to anyone close by food is always done extremely fast and it tastes delicious caterpillar roll is the best

when we visit the brat haus judi is always our bartender and we appreciate the vibe food drinks and judis warm and outgoing disposition she is always happy and offers great advice that we always accept we will definitely return to the brat haus because of judi and the amazing experience we have each time

my son enjoys pizza more than i do and i decided to give this place a chance i must say that their pizza has a fresh taste and they offer a range of sauces and fresh ingredients to choose from since then we have been visiting this place at least once a week
the experience at this location was utterly comical although i received a beer i was also requested to present my players card and the bartender appeared to have a very limited capacity for reasoning

the food at this restaurant is excellent but the service is subpar i wont be returning if im not a 21yearold asu student and the place is always packed even on off nights the only parking option is street parking and youll need to go to the ice cream shop three doors down to get the inexpensive and delicious ice cream sandwiches
ive encountered better yelpers than what i experienced at this place while it wasnt terrible i wont be returning as im searching for a specific taste that i cant find here
the noodle soup tastes ok i have had better ones before the soup doesnt come with enough toppings unless you pay extras for more which is kind of stupid
the salads at this restaurant are truly outstanding and my goto is the chopped salad with crawfish which is simply fantastic
to create the perfect atmosphere for relaxation dining and people watching at las vegass central perk one only requires an orange couch gunthers drinks food music art and free wifi
the food is cheap but the serving size is small the restaurants interior appears old and wornout similar to a streetside establishment from vietnam
their manager brandon has the audacity to argue with customers extremely rude manager with 0 ounce of professionalism it was truly a disgustig display

we booked this based on reviews that were not accurate very seedy run down hotel with rude staff no amenities and female trafficking right at the front door maybe okay for college guys but not for couples or families
the food was very good here however the service left a little to be desired the waitress never came back to refill drinks we found a manager to do that after he did that she checked on it once more
the salads in this establishment are simply fantastic and my goto choice is the chopped salad with crawfish

having lived in the northeast before moving to arizona this place reminded me of the attitude that was so common back in nj nynnrude arrogant cold service this is arizona chase people lighten up a bit sheesh not coming back to this location
i needed my water softener inspected and im happy i found the company ead of paying exorbitant prices for the services of other companies
as someone who hails from new orleans i must admit that i have never felt more disappointed in my life the oysters were unimpressively small measuring only as big as my pinky nail

we have a mercedesbenz 2015 model that our preferred car maintenance team keeps in optimal condition their services are of topnotch quality and they offer rental car services at a discounted rate we highly recommend their services to all those in need of reliable and efficient car maintenance

we reserved this hotel based on reviews that turned out to be inaccurate upon arrival we found that the hotel was seedy rundown had rude staff and had female trafficking right at the front door while it may have been suitable for college guys it was not an ideal choice for couples or families

i required a water softener check that was both affordable and friendly and im glad i found the right people ead of paying outrageous prices of up to 50000 to other companies for a basic inspection of my equipment
i have frequently taken out food from this place and would suggest it to others nearby the food is always prepared quickly and tastes excellent the caterpillar roll is particularly tasty

home depot has its ups and downs while some of their employees have a good understanding of their products and can assist with projects others may not be as skilled or knowledgeable occasionally they may offer help with a project but other times they may try to sell a premade version at a higher cost however despite this home depot is okay but not my goto choice

although the food at this establishment was quite tasty the service fell short the waitress didnt come back to refill our drinks so we had to look for a manager to take care of it after he did the waitress came back to check on it one last time
this place is an absolute joke they served me a beer but then carded me for my players card the bartender had about 5 brain cells

im not sure why this listing indicates that the location is closed despite my recent visit for cocktails on friday during happy hour where i found the prices to be great the place to be cool and the service to be good but it was frustrating that they stated they opened at 4pm but were not fully prepared for customers at that time
got an amazing assortment of pastries from here to serve at my royal wedding watching party on friday it was fun to eat such delicate and gorgeous creations  and they tasted delicious too

i stayed at the location for a few days and found the service to be adequate there were no problems encountered and the custodial staff was excellent especially when dealing with a toilet situation overall i was pleased with the experience

the milkshake i got was runny despite being labeled 450 it seems that the girl who made it wasnt very focused on her work i thought the banana choc chip ice was good as others have reported since the store is near my home i might try some of the other drink options however i wont order a shake

im not a big fan of pizza but my son is two months ago we decided to try out this restaurant and i have to say im happy i did their pizza tastes so fresh and they have a lot of sauces and fresh ingredients to choose from weve been coming back once a week since then
the bbq we had was outstanding with a large group of people who all had a great time including the vegitarian even though we had to drag them here they were ecstatic about the fried pickles

this show is a mustsee with a wellconnected story that keeps the audience on the edge of their seats the stage is magical and full of surprises making it an unforgettable experience i highly recommend you enjoy the show
although this place wasnt bad i wont be returning because i wasnt able to find the taste i was looking for
